definitions.usage: 形容某事物在时间或空间上保持不变、连续或稳定，常用于描述物理现象、数学值、或某种状态的持续性。

examples.scene: 一位工程师在测试一辆新车的引擎性能。他需要确保引擎在不同条件下都能以相同的速度运行，以验证其稳定性。
examples.chineseIdea: 工程师希望引擎在测试中保持稳定的运行速度，不受外界因素影响。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The engine maintained a @ @ during the entire test.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The engine maintained a 「constant speed」 during the entire test.
examples.chineseTranslation: 引擎在整个测试中保持了「恒定速度」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：The engine kept same speed in test. 纠正：The engine maintained a constant speed during the test.

examples.scene: 在一个化学实验室中，研究人员正在进行一项实验，需要将反应容器内的气压保持在一个固定的水平，以确保实验结果的准确性。
examples.chineseIdea: 研究人员希望气压在实验过程中不发生变化，以保证实验的可重复性。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The system ensured @ @ throughout the experiment.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The system ensured 「constant pressure」 throughout the experiment.
examples.chineseTranslation: 该系统确保了实验过程中「恒定压力」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：The system keep pressure not change in experiment. 纠正：The system ensured constant pressure throughout the experiment.

definitions.usage: 形容某事物反复发生或持续存在，通常带有轻微的负面含义，如干扰、抱怨或需求等，强调其频繁性。

examples.scene: 一位年轻的白领在城市中心租了一间公寓，但她发现楼下的街道总是很吵，影响了她的睡眠。
examples.chineseIdea: 她觉得街上的噪音几乎没有停过，让她感到很烦躁。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: She was frustrated by the @ @ from the street below.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: She was frustrated by the 「constant noise」 from the street below.
examples.chineseTranslation: 她对楼下街道传来的「持续噪音」感到沮丧。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：The street has noise all the time. 纠正：She was frustrated by the constant noise from the street below.

examples.scene: 在一个繁忙的客服中心，员工每天都要处理客户的各种问题，有些客户反复提出相同的要求，让员工感到压力很大。
examples.chineseIdea: 员工觉得客户的请求接连不断，处理起来很累。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The team was overwhelmed by the @ @ from clients.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The team was overwhelmed by the 「constant demands」 from clients.
examples.chineseTranslation: 团队被客户的「不断要求」压得喘不过气。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：Clients always ask many things. 纠正：The team was overwhelmed by the constant demands from clients.

definitions.usage: 形容某人对感情、信仰或关系的忠诚和坚定，通常用于描述人或其品质，具有正面情感色彩。

examples.scene: 一位老人在回忆他和妻子五十年的婚姻时，提到妻子一直是他最亲密的伙伴，无论生活多么艰难。
examples.chineseIdea: 他觉得妻子始终陪伴在他身边，是他生命中最重要的人。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His wife had been his @ @ through all the years.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His wife had been his 「constant companion」 through all the years.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他的妻子多年来一直是他的「忠实伴侣」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：His wife always with him. 纠正：His wife had been his constant companion through all the years.

examples.scene: 一位大学生在异国他乡求学感到孤独时，总是能接到父母的电话和鼓励，这让他感到温暖和支持。
examples.chineseIdea: 他觉得父母的关心从未间断，给了他继续前行的动力。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: His parents provided @ @ during his time abroad.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: His parents provided 「constant support」 during his time abroad.
examples.chineseTranslation: 他的父母在他海外期间提供了「持续支持」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：His parents always help him. 纠正：His parents provided constant support during his time abroad.
